reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for Magic Track & Snap n' Glow Track!
reviews.reviewText: Bought some different cars for our Snap n' Glow track but they were a little too wide and had a hard time on any tight curves so I was searching for others that would actually work and found these! My son loves then because they are pick up trucks and they work so well on our Track! Very happy with this purchase! They are cute and seem pretty well made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Race track trucks
reviews.reviewText: It fits the track perfectly. They are nice little trucks with lights in the front. The batteries don’t seem to last very long maybe would last longer with rechargeable batteries. Would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, tiny on/off switch
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We have had magic tracks for years, and the original cars finally stopped working so we go these car replacements, and it has proven to be a great addition with its smooth movement on the tracks, providing an exciting experience for kids. The cars are sturdy and durable, ensuring long-lasting play, and the variety of colors adds a fun element. The only drawback is the placement of the small on/off switch on the bottom of the car, which can be a bit inconvenient. The original cars had a larger, easily accessible button on the top of the cars that made it easy for little hands. Despite this minor design flaw, the overall performance and entertainment value make it a worthwhile purchase, enhancing the excitement of Magic Tracks playtime for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves these!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these light up cars for my son, and I must say, they have been a huge hit! My son absolutely loves playing with these toys, and the lights add an extra level of excitement to his playtime. As someone with sensory issues, he is drawn to anything that lights up, and these toys have been a perfect gift for him. The lights flicker while they are driving, which adds an element of fun and captivates his attention. Seeing the joy on his face as he plays with these toys is truly priceless.The only downside I have noticed is that these toys drain the batteries quite quickly because they constantly run. However, this is a minor inconvenience compared to the hours of entertainment and happiness they bring to my son. I highly recommend these cars to parents looking for a toy that will keep their little ones busy and engaged, especially if they have sensory issues. 10/10
